# mythicbeasts Provider

Manage Mythic Beasts resources with Terraform.

## Authentication

The Mythic Beasts APIs require an [API key](https://www.mythic-beasts.com/customer/api-users) for authentication.

When creating the key you must add permissions to work with the APIs you wish to use.

## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_version = ">= 1.11.0"

  required_providers {
    mythicbeasts = {
      source = "paultibbetts/mythicbeasts"
    }
  }
}

provider "mythicbeasts" {
  # Leave unset to use environment variables:
  # MYTHICBEASTS_KEYID and MYTHICBEASTS_SECRET
  #
  # keyid  = "your-keyid"
  # secret = "your-secret"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `keyid` (String)
- `secret` (String, Sensitive)
